title: How to Change Your Profile Picture on YouTube: 2024 Guide

steps.title: Open the YouTube app.
steps.content: Open the YouTube app. This looks like a white play button in a red square. If you aren't already logged in , enter your email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Tap your current profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your current profile picture. You can find this at the bottom-right corner. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap View channel.
steps.content: Tap View channel . This is on the right of your YouTube handle.

steps.title: Tap the pencil icon.
steps.content: Tap the pencil icon. You can find this on the right side of your bio, next to Manage videos and the Analytics icon.

steps.title: Tap your current profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your current profile picture. This will have a camera icon on top of it.

steps.title: Tap Choose from your photos.
steps.content: Tap Choose from your photos . This will open your device's gallery. If you want to use your camera to snap a new photo instead, tap Take a photo .

steps.title: Select a new photo and tap Save.
steps.content: Select a new photo and tap Save . If needed, reposition the photo, or zoom in/out. Your new profile will be saved. If you want to change your cover photo , tap your current banner. Follow the same steps to add a new profile picture.

steps.title: Go to https://www.youtube.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.youtube.com in a web browser. If you're not signed in to YouTube , click Sign In in the upper-right corner to do so now.

steps.title: Click your current profile picture.
steps.content: Click your current profile picture. This is in the top-right corner of the page.

steps.title: Click View your channel.
steps.content: Click View your channel . You can find this underneath your YouTube handle .

steps.title: Click Customize channel.
steps.content: Click Customize channel . This is at the top of the page, next to your profile picture. A new page will open.

steps.title: Click Branding.
steps.content: Click Branding . This is the tab between Layout and Basic info .

steps.title: Click Change.
steps.content: Click Change . This is the button to the right of your profile picture. If you don't have a profile picture currently added, you'll see Upload instead.

steps.title: Select a new profile picture.
steps.content: Select a new profile picture. Use the pop-up window to navigate to your image file. Select it, and then click Open . If needed, reposition the photo, or zoom in/out. Your new profile will be saved. Your new profile picture will be saved. If you want to upload a new cover photo, click Upload next to Banner image and select a photo.
